techmeme.title: Hands-on with Apple Watch Series 11, SE 3, and Ultra 3: SE 3 feels surprisingly similar to the Series 11 and the satellite SOS feature is neat (The Verge)
Ramp says it has hit $1B in annualized revenue, after saying it had hit $700M in March; it was valued at $22.5B in July (Julie Bort/TechCrunch)
Hands-on with Apple AirPods Pro 3: updated ANC system is impressive, foam ear tips are more comfortable but their fit and feel will take some getting used to (Billy Steele/Engadget)
iPhone Air hands-on: very thin with rounded edges reminiscent of previous iPhone designs and a camera "plateau" that flows smoothly into the back of the phone (The Verge)
Sources: Reflection AI, which is building AI coding tools, nears a deal to raise ~$1B at a valuation of $4.5B to $5.5B; Nvidia's VC arm would invest $250M+ (Financial Times)
